SELECT t.teacher_no, t.teacher_name, d.college, d.professional, d.grade, c.course_name, c.course_no, c.coursse_password FROM t_sys_teacher t LEFT JOIN t_sys_teach tc ON t.teacher_no = tc.teacher_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_courseinfo c ON tc.course_no = c.course_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_dept d ON c.dept_id = d.dept_id
t.teacher_no = #{teacherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE t_sys_courseinfo SET coursse_password = #{coursePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE course_no = #{courseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT s.student_no, s.student_name, d.college, d.professional, d.grade, t1.teacher_name, c.course_name, c.course_no, c.course_password, a.attendance_no, a.attendance_memo FROM t_sys_student s LEFT JOIN t_sys_take t ON s.student_no = t.student_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_course c ON t.course_no = c.course_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_teach t1 ON c.course_no = t1.course_no LEFT JOIN t_sys_dept d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_attendance a ON a.student_no = c.course_no AND a.coruse_no = c.course_no
c.course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
